text.autoconfig.tutorialmod.title: Broken Lead Warner Options
text.autoconfig.tutorialmod.option.actio: Should the warning message be small?
If true, The warning message will be small
Will also appear right above the HUD
If false, The warning message will be big
Will appear in the center of the screen
text.autoconfig.tutorialmod.option.rainb: If true, the warning text will be rainbow
If false, the warning text will be red
This more of a fun option then a useful option
